thread.title: Here Is Your 2017 Baseball Hall Of Fame Class
thread.title_full: Here Is Your 2017 Baseball Hall Of Fame Class

author: Tom Ley
title: Here Is Your 2017 Baseball Hall Of Fame Class
text:
Go to permalink 
Thanks to Ryan Thibodaux’s diligent ballot tracking, we already knew that Jeff Bagwell and Tim Raines (thank God) were going into the Hall of Fame this year. Now that all of the ballots have been counted, we can see if anyone else will be joining them. Advertisement 
Ivan Rodriguez made it! This is good, because Pudge is awesome. 
That’s it, nobody else made it. The other suckers will have to wait until next year. Here is how all the votes shook out: 
Which snub are you most angry about? Please tell me in your loudest possible voice. Recommended Stories
